meanings.definition: To make a signal or signals to
meanings.sent1: She signalised to her friend across the room.
meanings.sent2: The traffic lights signalised the cars to stop.
meanings.sent3: The cat signalised to the birds with a flick of its tail.
meanings.sent4: The bright colors of the flowers signalised the arrival of spring.
meanings.sent5: The lighthouse signalised the ships in the dark night.

meanings.sent1: The ship was signalised with flags for the celebration.
meanings.sent2: The building was signalised with neon lights.
meanings.sent3: The robot signalised itself with blinking lights.
meanings.sent4: The forest was signalised with colorful markers for the hikers.
meanings.sent5: The car was signalised with reflective strips for safety.
